title: Domain of log functions
text: The domain of the log function $$f(x)=\log_{a}\left(x\right)$$ is $$(0,\infty)$$.

title: Transformations
text: $$f(x)=\ln(5-2x)$$ translates the parent function $$5$$ units left, horizontally shrinks it by a factor of $$\frac{1}{2}$$, and reflects it across the y-axis.
